a.title: Andhadhun
a.description: A thriller film about a blind pianist who becomes embroiled in a murder case.

a.title: Airlift
a.description: A film based on the true story of the largest human evacuation in history.

b.title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
b.description: A heartwarming tale of a man's journey to reunite a mute Pakistani girl with her family.

b.title: Barfi!
b.description: A romantic comedy-drama featuring a love triangle involving a mute and deaf man.

c.title: Chennai Express
c.description: A comedy-action film about a man who travels to Rameswaram and gets caught up in a series of misadventures.

c.title: Chhichhore
c.description: A film about a group of friends who reunite after many years and recall their college days.

d.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
d.description: A classic romantic film about a young couple who fall in love during a trip to Europe.

d.title: Dangal
d.description: A biographical sports drama about a former wrestler who trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers.

e.title: Ek Tha Tiger
e.description: An action film about a spy who falls in love with a Pakistani woman during a mission.

e.title: English Vinglish
e.description: A film about a woman who enrolls in an English-speaking course to regain her self-esteem.

f.title: Freddy
f.description: A thriller film about a shy and introverted dentist whose life takes a dark turn.

f.title: Fukrey
f.description: A comedy about a group of friends who get caught up in a scheme to make quick money.

g.title: Gully Boy
g.description: A musical drama about a street rapper from Mumbai who pursues his dreams despite obstacles.

g.title: Gangaajal
g.description: A film about a police officer who fights against corruption in a small town.

h.title: Hera Pheri
h.description: A comedy film about three hapless individuals who get entangled in a kidnapping scheme.

h.title: Highway
h.description: A drama about a young woman who finds freedom and self-discovery during a road trip.

i.title: Ishaqzaade
i.description: A romantic drama about two young lovers from feuding families.

j.title: Jab We Met
j.description: A romantic comedy about the journey of a young woman who meets a charming man on a train journey.

j.title: Jolly LLB
j.description: A comedy-drama about a small-time lawyer who takes on a high-profile case.

k.title: Kabir Singh
k.description: A drama about a young surgeon with a self-destructive streak and his tumultuous love life.

k.title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
k.description: A romantic drama about friendship, love, and the trials of relationships.

l.title: Lagaan
l.description: A period drama about villagers who challenge British officers to a cricket match to avoid paying taxes.

l.title: Ludo
l.description: A dark comedy that intertwines the lives of several people through a series of chaotic events.

m.title: Masaan
m.description: A poignant drama that explores the lives of people in Varanasi dealing with love, loss, and redemption.

m.title: Mohenjo Daro
m.description: A historical film set in the ancient Indus Valley Civilization, revolving around a young man’s journey.

n.title: Naina
n.description: A drama about a woman struggling to cope with her past trauma.

n.title: Nikhil
n.description: A film exploring the life of a man caught between love and societal pressures.

o.title: Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!
o.description: A comedy-drama about a lovable thief who becomes a media sensation.

o.title: Om Shanti Om
o.description: A reincarnation drama about a film star from the 1970s who returns to avenge his death in a later life.

p.title: Piku
p.description: A family drama about a father-daughter relationship and the struggles of managing old age.

p.title: Padmaavat
p.description: A historical epic about the legend of Queen Padmavati and her fight against the invader Alauddin Khilji.

q.title: Queen
q.description: A comedy-drama about a young woman who embarks on a solo honeymoon trip after her fiancé calls off their wedding.

r.title: Raja Hindustani
r.description: A romantic drama about a taxi driver who falls in love with a wealthy girl.

r.title: Raazi
r.description: A spy thriller about an Indian woman married to a Pakistani military officer who serves as a spy during the 1971 Indo-Pak war.

s.title: Sholay
s.description: A classic action-adventure film about two criminals hired to defeat a notorious bandit.

s.title: Swades
s.description: A drama about an NRI who returns to India to bring about social change in his village.

t.title: Taare Zameen Par
t.description: A drama about a dyslexic child and his struggles with the traditional education system.

t.title: Tumhari Sulu
t.description: A comedy-drama about a housewife who unexpectedly becomes a successful radio jockey.

u.title: Udta Punjab
u.description: A gritty drama about the drug problem in Punjab and its impact on different individuals.

v.title: Vicky Donor
v.description: A comedy-drama about a sperm donor and the challenges he faces with his family and society.

w.title: Wake Up Sid
w.description: A coming-of-age film about a young man who learns responsibility after flunking his exams.

x.title: X: Past Is Present
x.description: A film exploring the lives and relationships of a group of people across different time periods.

y.title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
y.description: A film about friendship and romance as four friends reunite and reflect on their past.

z.title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
z.description: A film about three friends on a road trip that changes their perspectives on life and relationships.
